channel.title: Unhandled Packet 40? What Does This Mean?
channel.description:
Ok, for a long time now I've been getting messages in my server window saying unhandled packet 40 etc...I've never really attempted to fix this at all and I never really cared, but now I realize, it's really freaking annoying lol... What's wrong and what do I have to do? Is it effecting gameplay at all, like does it lag my server or could it crash it? This is what it says:
[code] [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 1 5[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 3 3[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 1 B[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 2 D[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 0 F[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 0 F[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6275, size=2]: ]03 2 1[ [client-3-thenoobshow5]: Action Button: 24003 [client-10-dharok pure]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6347, size=2]: ]4B 1 E[ [client-10-dharok pure]: Action Button: 24075 [client-10-dharok pure]: Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6347, size=2]: ]4B 1 B[ [client-10-dharok pure]: Action Button: 24075[/code]
Should I find Action Button 24075 and 24003? I don't know.... Help would be appreciated.

item.title: Unhandled Packet 40? What Does This Mean?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Well, I get this all the time. Why would they be trying to talk to npcs all the time?

Read full topic
item.source: Unhandled Packet 40? What Does This Mean?

item.title: Unhandled Packet 40? What Does This Mean?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

It looks like packet 40 isn’t handling one of the dialogues within your UpdateNPCChat() method.

Read full topic
item.source: Unhandled Packet 40? What Does This Mean?
